title: What are some great mind-blowing music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am a big fan of Morphine. There are all sorts of undertones to their music. There is a brooding sense of melancholy yet Mark Sandman’s distinct vocals and slide bass along with Dana Colley’s double sax lines have a sensuality to them as well. Jerome Deupree also has more space to let his drumming “Breathe” than most others because of the sparse instrumentation. I love the production as well.
